sentences.english: “The Legend of the White Snake” is one of the most famous Chinese tales.
sentences.chinese: “白蛇傳”是中國最有名的傳說之一。

sentences.english: I was deeply moved by this TV "tale of white sneak".
sentences.chinese: 我被電視“白蛇傳”深深地感動着。

sentences.english: Legend of the White Snake is one of the most famous tales spreading out among folks in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 白蛇傳是流傳在古代中國非常著名的一個神話故事。

sentences.english: The Chinese story of "White Snake" is alive and well today.
sentences.chinese: 中國“白蛇傳”的故事如今仍在持續流傳着。
